document.full_text: a program to expand the busiest commercial crossing over the u.s.-mexico border was inaugurated on friday, nearly doubling the capacity for trucks entering laredo, texas, from nuevo laredo, mexico, authorities said.
document.title: u.s. expands truck crossing on mexico border
lines_and_colors: a program to expand the busiest commercial crossing over the u.s.-mexico border was inaugurated on friday, nearly doubling the capacity for trucks entering laredo, texas, from nuevo laredo, mexico, authorities said.
